description: Long-Stay National Visa (Type D) for higher education (>90 days). Optimized for Indian applicants with strict document standards.

meta.max_stay: Duration of Course (Converted to Residence Permit upon arrival)
meta.min_funds_requirement: Approx. 11,208 EUR - 12,000 EUR per year (Blocked Account preferred)

documents.title: Original Passport & Copies
documents.description: Valid for at least 12 months. Must have 2 blank pages. Include 2 sets of photocopies of the first/last page and any previous visas (US, UK, Schengen).

documents.title: 3 Biometric Photographs
documents.description: 35x45mm, white background, 80% face coverage, matte finish. Ears must be visible. Do not staple.

documents.title: National Visa Application Form (Type D)
documents.description: Completed and signed Long-Stay form. (Note: This is different from the Tourist 'Type C' form).

documents.title: Unconditional Letter of Acceptance
documents.description: Official admission letter from the university stating course name, duration, and language of instruction.

documents.title: Motivation Letter / Cover Letter
documents.description: A strong essay explaining why you chose this country, how the course aids your career in India, and your intent to return.

documents.title: Proof of Accommodation
documents.description: Dormitory confirmation, rental contract, or temporary hotel booking for arrival.

steps_flow.title: University Admission
steps_flow.description: Secure the Unconditional Offer Letter and pay the required tuition deposit.

steps_flow.title: Document Legalization (Apostille)
steps_flow.description: Get your original Indian degree certificates and mark sheets Apostilled by the MEA (e-Sanad or outsourcing agency).

steps_flow.title: Secure Financials
steps_flow.description: Open a Blocked Account (if required by country) or gather liquid fund proofs (Savings/FDs).

steps_flow.title: Book Visa Appointment
steps_flow.description: Schedule a 'National Visa (Type D)' appointment at VFS Global or the relevant Embassy.
